description: This file defines a React component 'NoteEditor' used for creating and editing notes within a notes application. It includes state management, event handling for keyboard shortcuts, and UI elements for input fields including title, content, tags, color, and pinned status.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing notes, with handlers for save, close, and input management.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving the current note data, assigns ID and timestamps if new.

methods.name: setTagString
methods.description: Converts comma-separated string to array of tags and updates state.

methods.name: handleBackdrop
methods.description: Handles clicks on the backdrop to close the modal.
